title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embedding provider in chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark/light themes, mobile friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, and pull/generate utilities.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple idiomatic interface to chat, stream, and manage models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with chat history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, streaming, and both synchronous and async patterns.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks including CPU-only and NVIDIA-GPU variants plus Open WebUI sidecar.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; strongly-typed requests/responses with tokio streaming.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Ready-to-deploy Flask chatbot template that exposes Ollama via REST with history and session mgmt.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Official registry of community-contributed Modelfiles for Llama, Phi, Starling, Zephyr, CodeLlama, etc.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app providing Ollama integration with admin UI, async views, and REST endpoints.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with Ollama models in threads, DMs, or channels with rate limits.
